com.optimizely.ab.android.datafile_handler

Interface DatafileHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultDatafileHandler

    public interface DatafileHandler
    DatafileHandler class that is used to interact with the datafile_handler module. This interface can be overridden so that the sdk user can provide a override for the default DatafileHandler.

    • Method Detail

      • downloadDatafile

        java.lang.String downloadDatafile(android.content.Context context,
                                  java.lang.String projectId)
        Synchronous call to download the datafile.
        Parameters:
        context - application context for download
        projectId - project id of the project for the datafile
        Returns:
        a valid datafile or null

      • downloadDatafile

        void downloadDatafile(android.content.Context context,
                      java.lang.String projectId,
                      DatafileLoadedListener listener)
        Asynchronous download data file.
        Parameters:
        context - application context for download
        projectId - project id of the datafile to get
        listener - listener to call when datafile download complete

      • startBackgroundUpdates

        void startBackgroundUpdates(android.content.Context context,
                            java.lang.String projectId,
                            java.lang.Long updateInterval)
        Start background updates to the project datafile .
        Parameters:
        context - application context for download
        projectId - project id for background updates.
        updateInterval - frequency of updates in seconds

      • stopBackgroundUpdates

        void stopBackgroundUpdates(android.content.Context context,
                           java.lang.String projectId)
        Stop the background updates.
        Parameters:
        context - application context for download
        projectId - project id of the datafile uploading

      • saveDatafile

        void saveDatafile(android.content.Context context,
                  java.lang.String projectId,
                  java.lang.String dataFile)
        Save the datafile to cache.
        Parameters:
        context - application context for datafile cache
        projectId - project id of the datafile
        dataFile - the datafile to save

      • loadSavedDatafile

        java.lang.String loadSavedDatafile(android.content.Context context,
                                   java.lang.String projectId)
        Load a cached datafile if it exists
        Parameters:
        context - application context for datafile cache
        projectId - project id of the datafile to try and get from cache
        Returns:
        the datafile cached or null if it was not available

      • isDatafileSaved

        java.lang.Boolean isDatafileSaved(android.content.Context context,
                                  java.lang.String projectId)
        Has the file already been cached locally?
        Parameters:
        context - application context for datafile cache
        projectId - projectId of the datafile
        Returns:
        true if the datafile is cached or false if not.

      • removeSavedDatafile

        void removeSavedDatafile(android.content.Context context,
                         java.lang.String projectId)
        Remove the datafile in cache.
        Parameters:
        context - application context for datafile cache
        projectId - project id of the datafile
